rule.title: Forbidden DocumentName tag
rule.description: DocumentName tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: DocumentName tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Forbidden Model tag
rule.description: Model tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: Model tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Orientation valid value
rule.description: the only valid value for Orientation tag is 1 in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Forbidden PageName tag
rule.description: PageName tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: PageName tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Forbidden HostComputer tag
rule.description: HostComputer tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: HostComputer tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Forbidden Site tag
rule.description: Site tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: Site tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: Forbidden IT8Header tag
rule.description: IT8Header tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1
rule.assert: IT8Header tag is forbidden in TIFF/IT P1

rules.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 Colour continuous-tone picture
rules.description:
There are three formats for describing the pixel structure of colour continuous-tone picture file data: pixel interleaving (also called chunky format). line interleaving (also called row interleaving). colour interleaving (also called planar format).
TIFF/IT-CT/P1 is a simplified image file format profile for colour continuous-tone picture image (CT) data and can be considered a constrained subset of TIFF/IT-CT. TIFF/IT-CT/P1 files can be read by typical TIFF 6.0 readers and be written by typical TIFF 6.0 writers that conform to TIFF 6.0, Section 16: CMYK Images.
TIFF/IT-CT/P1 does not permit any compression of image data.
NOTE TIFF/IT-CT/P1 do not allow the use of a value 32895 for field 259 (Compression) to indicate the use of raster padding nor do they allow the use of field 34019 (RasterPadding).

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 BitsPerSample valid values
rule.description: BitsPerSample on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) file must be 8,8,8,8
rule.assert: Invalid BitsPerSample value. BitsPerSample should be [8,8,8,8]

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 Compression valid value
rule.description: The only valid value for Compression is 1, No compression.
rule.assert: Invalid Compression value for colour continuous-tone picture (CT) image. The only valid value is no compression (1)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 PhotometricInterpretation valid value
rule.description: The only valid value for PhotometricInterpretation in continuous-tone picture (CT) is CMYK
rule.assert: Invalid Compression value for colour continuous-tone picture (CT) image

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 SamplesPerPixel valid value
rule.description: The only valid value for SamplesPerPixel in continuous-tone picture (CT) is 4
rule.assert: Invalid SamplesPerPixel. SamplesPerPixel for colour continuous-tone picture (CT) CMYK should be 4

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 PlanarConfiguration valid values
rule.description: PlanarConfiguration on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) file must be 1
rule.assert: Invalid PlanarConfiguration. PlanarConfiguration for colour continuous-tone picture (CT) CMYK should be 1

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 InkSet valid value
rule.description: InkSet on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) file must be 1
rule.assert: Invalid InkSet. InkSet for colour continuous-tone picture (CT) CMYK should be 1

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 InkNames forbidden tag
rule.description: InkNames is forbidden on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT)
rule.assert: InkNames is forbidden on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 NumberOfInks valid value
rule.description: If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must be 4
rule.assert: invalid NumberOfInks. If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must be 4

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 NumberOfInks match SamplesPerPixel
rule.description: If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must have the same value as the value of SamplesPerPixel
rule.assert: invalid NumberOfInks. If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must have the same value as the value of SamplesPerPixel

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 DotRange valid value
rule.description: If DotRange tag is used, it must be 0,255
rule.assert: invalid DotRange. If DotRange tag is used, it must be 0,255

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 ColorSequence is forbidden
rule.description: ColorSequence on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden
rule.assert: ColorSequence on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 RasterPadding is forbidden
rule.description: RasterPadding on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden
rule.assert: RasterPadding on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 TrapIndicator is forbidden
rule.description: TrapIndicator on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden
rule.assert: TrapIndicator on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 CMYKEquivalent is forbidden
rule.description: CMYKEquivalent on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden
rule.assert: CMYKEquivalent on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-CT/P1 InterColourProfile is forbidden
rule.description: InterColourProfile on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden
rule.assert: InterColourProfile on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rules.title: Colour line-art (LW) file
rules.description:
Colour line-art data consists of an image file comprised of the following three parts.The first part consists of one or more blocks of run-length encoded data describing the colour line-art image in terms of colour numbers and run lengths.The second part is a colour table (in the IFD) that defines the colour values for the colour numbers of the first part.The third part is a table describing the separations of the second part.This data structure is similar to binary line-art data with the addition of two colour tables for colour specification.
TIFF/IT-LW/P1 is a simplified image-file format profile for line-art (LW) image data and can be considered a constrained subset of TIFF/IT-LW specified for simpler implementation.
NOTE TIFF/IT-LW files are not readable by typical TIFF 6.0 readers and cannot be written by typical TIFF 6.0 writers because of the mandatory use of TIFF/IT-specific fields and values and non-traditional interpretations of other TIFF 6.0 fields and values (e.g. compression by mandatory run length encoding).

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 BitsPerSample valid value
rule.description: BitsPerSample valid value on a Colour line-art picture (LW) file must be 8
rule.assert: Invalid BitsPerSample value. BitsPerSample on a Colour line-art picture (LW) file must be 8

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 Compression valid value
rule.description: Compression value on a Colour line-art picture (LW) picture must be IT8 Linework RLE (32896)
rule.assert: Invalid Compression value, Compression should be IT8 Linework RLE (32896)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 PhotometricInterpretation valid value
rule.description: PhotometricInterpretation value on a Colour line-art picture (LW) picture must be CMYK (5)
rule.assert: Invalid PhotometricInterpretation value, Compression should be CMYK (5)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 SamplesPerPixel valid value
rule.description: SamplesPerPixel value on a Colour line-art picture (LW) picture must be 1
rule.assert: Invalid SamplesPerPixel value, Compression should be 1

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 TrapIndicator is forbidden
rule.description: TrapIndicator on a Colour line-art picture (LW) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 CMYKEquivalent is forbidden
rule.description: CMYKEquivalent on a Colour line-art picture (LW) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 InterColourProfile is forbidden
rule.description: InterColourProfile on a Colour line-art picture (LW) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 ColorTable is mandatory
rule.description: ColorTable is mandatory for on a Colour line-art picture (LW) TIFF/IT P1

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 ColorSequence is forbidden
rule.description: ColorSequence on a Colour line-art picture (LW) TIFF/IT P1 file is forbidden

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 NumberOfInks valid value
rule.description: If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must have the same value as the value of SamplesPerPixel

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 InkNames forbidden tag
rule.description: InkNames is forbidden on a colour continuous-tone picture (CT)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-LW/P1 NumberOfInks valid value
rule.description: If NumberOfInks tag is used, it must have the same value as the value of SamplesPerPixel

rules.title: High-resolution continuous-tone (HC) file
rules.description:
High-resolution continuous-tone data consist of an image file of one or more blocks of run-length encoded pixel data. The number of lines is defined in the ImageLength field. Each line is made up of pixel runs and starts and ends with a blank pixel run (all zero bytes). Each pixel run is made up of two components: a run length followed by a colour value. The run length is a 16-bit integer as defined in 7.4.2.4.2. The big-endian byte order is used regardless of the order used in the TIFF/IT directories (IFD). The sum of the run lengths in the line shall be the value found in ImageWidth. Run lengths shall not cross line boundaries. The colour value is defined by the values of SamplesPerPixel, BitsPerSample, ColorSequence and DotRange in the same manner that CT colour values are specified, except that a special case of colour value is reserved for a transparent colour, if used.
TIFF/IT field 34028 is used as the transparency indicator. If transparency is used, colour values of zero become a special case, and signify transparency in that separation of the high-resolution continuous-tone (HC) data. Transparency indicates that the underlying colour picture separation value is used.
TIFF/IT-HC/P1 is a simplified image file format profile for high-resolution continuous-tone (HC) image data and can be considered a constrained subset of TIFF/IT-HC specifically intended for simpler implementation.
NOTE TIFF/IT-HC/P1 is not readable by typical TIFF 6.0 readers and cannot be written by typical TIFF 6.0 writers because of the mandatory use of TIFF/IT-specific fields and values and nontraditional interpretations of other TIFF 6.0 fields and values (e.g. compression by mandatory run-length encoding).

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC Compression valid value
rule.description: Compression valid values for High-resolution continuous-tone data is IT8MP Run-length encoding, used with HC format (32897)

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC PhotometricInterpretation valid value
rule.description: PhotometricInterpretation valid value for High-resolution continuous-tone data is 32897

rules.title: Binary picture (BP) file
rules.description:
For binary pictures, ImageColorValue and BackgroundColorValue may contain the values of the colour components for the image (foreground) and background colour, specified in the sequence as defined in ColorSequence. These colour values apply to the solid image and background colours for binary pictures. The data stream indicates which of the colours, foreground and background, will print. The bits in the data stream function as a switch between the image colour and the background colour. Bitmap fill order is from most significant bit to least significant bit within the byte, the default TIFF fill order. ImageColorIndicator and BackgroundColorIndicator field values shall be used to indicate when, if, and how image and background colours are used, including the use of transparency.
TIFF/IT-BP/P1 limit the field values to the default value, a single value or a small choice of values. TIFF/IT-BP/P1 also limit the usage of optional fields to the minimum required for reasonable interchange.
NOTE TIFF/IT-BP/P1 is a simplified image file format profile for binary picture (BP) image data and can be considered a constrained subset of TIFF/IT-BP specifically intended for simpler implementation. TIFF/IT-BP/P1 files can be read by typical TIFF 6.0 readers and be written by typical TIFF 6.0 writers. TIFF/IT-BP/P1 files will be recognized by baseline TIFF 6.0 readers as Bilevel Images as described by Section 3 of the TIFF 6.0 specification. As such, all reference to colour specifications will be lost since those fields describing colour are not recognized by a baseline TIFF 6.0 reader.

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC Compression valid value
rule.description: Compression valid values for High-resolution continuous-tone data is 1

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC PhotometricInterpretation valid value
rule.description: PhotometricInterpretation valid values for High-resolution continuous-tone data are 1,2,8

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC InkSet forbidden
rule.description: InkSet tag is forbidden for High-resolution continuous-tone data

rule.title: TIFF/IT-HC InkNames forbidden
rule.description: InkNames tag is forbidden for High-resolution continuous-tone data

rule.description: TrapIndicator tag is forbidden for High-resolution continuous-tone data

rule.description: CMYKEquivalent tag is forbidden for High-resolution continuous-tone data
